title: In The Middle Of A Miracle
itunes:title: In The Middle Of A Miracle
description:
When we go through difficult seasons, it's easy to live worried and stressed, wondering when things are going to change. But what we need to realize is that we're not just in the middle of a difficulty, we’re in the middle of a miracle.

The story isn’t over. Your best days are still ahead of you! Together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
